elements.text:
You are meeting with your boss. To make it on-time, you just walked up two flights of stairs quickly, and feel your heart beating very rapidly.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I smile at my boss once I make it to the meeting.
I feel the urge to look up my symptoms online, but remind myself that feeling this way is normal after going up a lot of stairs.
I breathe deeply and focus on calming myself.
I ask my boss if I could be having a heart attack.
I remind myself to take a few slow breaths to recenter my thoughts after I feel the urge to cry.
